Change to a nice pale color for our background like: #FFCCCB, #FFCD95, #FFFFCA, #95FF95, #CCCBFF

Choose another grey color like #c0c0c0 for our table
Drag the block onto your code space
Now let's use the Motion sensor to make it interactive
Drag the block onto your code space
Use the motion value to control the lerp block, open the Motion tray
Drag the block onto your code space
Move your hand over the sensor and see how the button moves between the two numbers in the lerp block
Now let's add sound, open the Motion tray again
Drag the block onto your code space
Drop the block anywhere on your code space
Change 1 to 5 so it triggers when your hand is closest to the sensor

Now let's add a speaker to the app
Open the parts drawer by clicking here.

tooltips.text: Click on Speaker to add it to your app
